## Announcements

-   Teammates feedback #2 due Tue, Dec 06

-   Please fill out course evaluations and TA evaluations!

-   If you submitted a Round 1 submission, check GitHub Issues for feedback.

-   Project written report due Fri, Dec 09, 11:59pm. Will be accepted (with no late penalty) until Sun, Dec 11, 11:59pm

## Written report reminders {.midi}

-   Use a descriptive title for the report.

-   Suppress all code, warnings, and messages.

-   Neatly format every table / data frame using `kable()`.

-   Write the report in narrative form (avoid bullet point lists).

-   Use variable descriptions, not variable names, in narrative.

-   Use neatly formatted links and citations; include a reference list at the end of the report.

    -   At a minimum you should have a citation for the data set.

    -   [Click here](https://quarto.org/docs/visual-editor/technical.html#citations) for guide on adding citations in Quarto using the visual editor
